title: Going Places
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 48 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: This simple early-level reader shows students different ways they can get around, from planes to horses. Photos accompany the text in one-to-one correspondence for easy reading.
meta: bike, boat, bus, car, horse, plane, skateboard, train
Make, revise, and confirm predictions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information
Sound Discrimination : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
Consonants : Identify and read words with initial letter Bb
Capitalization and Punctuation : Understand that sentences begin with a capital letter and end with punctuation
Content Vocabulary : Understand and use content vocabulary

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
